channel.title: Softlayer_security_ssh_key on SoftLayer API

item.title: CreateSshKey.php
item.description: <?php /** * This script adds ssh key to the account for use during server provisioning and os reloads * * Important manual pages: * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key/createObject * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/datatypes/SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key * * @license <http://sldn.softlayer.com/wiki/index.php/license> * @author SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. <sldn@softlayer.com> */ require_once dirname(__FILE__) . "/SoftLayer/SoapClient.class.php"; /** * Your SoftLayer API username * @var string */ $username = "set me"; /** * Your SoftLayer API key * Generate one at: https://control.softlayer.com/account/users * @var string */ $apiKey = "set me"; /** * Declare the parameters to create de Ssh Key * @var String $key - The ssh key required for create.

item.title: DeleteSshKey.php
item.description: <?php /** * This script deletes a ssh key to the account. It is only necessary to specify the label, the script * uses an objectFilter to get the id from Ssh Key. * * Important manual pages: * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key/deleteObject * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/datatypes/SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key * * @license <http://sldn.softlayer.com/wiki/index.php/license> * @author SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. <sldn@softlayer.com> */ require_once dirname(__FILE__) . "/SoftLayer/SoapClient.class.php"; /** * Your SoftLayer API username * @var string */ $username = "set me"; /** * Your SoftLayer API key * Generate one at: https://control.

item.title: EditSshKey.php
item.description: <?php /** * This script edits a ssh key to the account. It is only necessary to specify the label from ssh key that * you wish to edit, the script uses an objectFilter to get the id from the Ssh Key. * * Important manual pages: * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key/editObject * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/datatypes/SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key * * @license <http://sldn.softlayer.com/wiki/index.php/license> * @author SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. <sldn@softlayer.com> */ require_once dirname(__FILE__) . "/SoftLayer/SoapClient.class.php"; /** * Your SoftLayer API username * @var string */ $username = "set me"; /** * Your SoftLayer API key * Generate one at: https://control.

item.title: GetSshKeys.php
item.description: <?php /** * This script retrieves customer specified SSH Keys that can be implemented onto a * newly provisioned or reloaded server. * * Important manual pages: * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/services/SoftLayer_Account/getSshKeys * @see http://sldn.softlayer.com/reference/datatypes/SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key * * @license <http://sldn.softlayer.com/wiki/index.php/license> * @author SoftLayer Technologies, Inc. <sldn@softlayer.com> */ require_once dirname(__FILE__) . item.title: SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key
item.description: SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key Service Datatype Description Local createDate The date a ssh key was added. This property is read only. Changes made will be silently ignored. Type: dateTime fingerprint A short sequence of bytes used to authenticate or lookup a longer ssh key. This will automatically be generated upon adding or modifying the ssh key. This property is read only. Changes made will be silently ignored.

item.title: createObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key::createObject Overview Add a ssh key to your account for use during server provisioning and os reloads. Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key The SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key object that you wish to create. Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_KeyObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key

item.title: deleteObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key::deleteObject Overview Remove a ssh key from your account. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_KeyInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean

item.title: editObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key::editObject Overview Update a ssh key. Parameters Name Type Description templateObject SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key A skeleton SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_Key object with only the properties defined that you wish to change. Unchanged properties are left alone. Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Security_Ssh_KeyInitParameters Optional Headers Return Values boolean
